plot outline: Moksha is a suspense thriller revolving around a sinister masked man and the mystery around his identity. Who is this Mask-Man? and what he is going to do? lies the crux of the film. With a combination of love, loneliness and crime, Moksha will take you on an adrenaline-filled ride.
title: Moksha
plot: _Moksha_ (qv) is a suspense thriller revolving around a sinister masked man and the mystery around his identity. Who is this Mask-Man? and what he is going to do? lies the crux of the film. With a combination of love, loneliness and crime, _Moksha_ (qv) will take you on an adrenaline-filled ride.
